users.description: the YouTube viewing users in the experiment. Contains credentials and other information

headless.description: When true, selenium will run without an interactive browser showing. Must be true when running in a container

discord.description: configuration for the discord bot used to request user validation

feed_scans.description: number of times to collect the list of videos in the feed

email.description: email of the user e.g. mra.userscrape@gmail.com

ideology.description: The users ideology, expected to be unique between users

notify_discord_user_id.description: the user id (e.g. 123465448467005488) in discord to notify

UserCfg.description: UserCfg(email: str, password: str, telephone_number: str, ideology: str, notify_discord_user_id: Union[int, NoneType])

bot_token.description: The auth token for the discord bot

channel_id.description: The channel to ask for user validation codes

cs.description: connection string to the azure blob storage account storing the input, and output from scraping.

container.description: the name of the container to store data

root_path.description: the root folder path to store data (e.g. folder1/folder2

StoreCfg.description: StoreCfg(cs: str, container: str = 'userscrape', root_path: str = '')
